data.description_html:
The subject gains a +8 resistance bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities (but not against supernatural and extraordinary abilities).
Material Component: A diamond of at least 500 gp value, which must be crushed and sprinkled over the targets.
Focus:One 1,000 gp diamond per creature to be granted the protection.
Each subject must carry one such gem for the duration of the spell.
If a subject loses the gem, the spell ceases to affect him.
data.name: Protection from Spells
data.target: Up to one creature touched per four levels
